data.title: Vazha-Pshavela - Host and Guest
data.meta_description: Vazha-Pshavela – Host and Guest - Free download as PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. Vazha-Pshavela (pseudonym of Luka Razikashvili) is considered to be one of the greatest Georgian poets. As a nature admirer, Vazha-Pshavela knows no comparison in Georgian poetry. His finest works are considered to be the tragic narrative poems “Host and Guest” (1893) and “The Snake-Eater” (1901) that combine Caucasian folk myth with human tragedy.
